lender.name: Women of Faith
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help underprivileged women throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of women of different faiths who want to work for peace and justice in the world.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop computer software that helps electric power companies plan and design new electric systems and analyze and maintain existing systems.

lender.name: Dave & Tammy
lender.loan_because: we believe the world can be changed if we would only share the excess we have. We should be ashamed when we have an extra bedroom and there are yet homeless people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I repair computers and administer networks for small companies.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: “Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime”—Author unknown These people are an inspiration-what a simple thing I can do to give back to the world to make it a better place. We all need friends to help us out from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: I work doing visual design and styling for businesses, photographers and cinematographers. I setup displays with mannequins, props, signage and also buy clothes and props for film and photo shoots.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: We are all one, a beautiful tapestry of hearts and souls, and we must help one another be the best we can be while on our planet.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help others respect, value and treat one another with dignity by opening up dialogue about intercultural nuances and how to resolve interpersonal and community conflict so as to create a more connected, peaceful world.

lender.name: Camilo
lender.loan_because: Giving money to someone is in most cases damaging to them. It doesn't teach them anything or provide an incentive to work. A microloan is the best way to lift someone from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychology professor.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I'm a quarter Ukranian, so want to lend there. Im a neighbor to Mexico, so want to lend there.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I am grateful.
lender.occupational_info: Involved in: environmental policy, farmworker advocacy, agricultural worker protection.

lender.name: Randy & Leigh
lender.loan_because: I have tried and can't think of a better way for the folks in the entire world who have a little extra to help the folks who are in need without charity but with caring and respect! Wow!
lender.occupational_info: Leigh and I are entrepreneurs to the core. We have had several businesses and have been helped with loans when we needed them. Now it is our turn to help!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: all hard-working men deserve the means to blossom in their field of dreams
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to refugees and give tours for school children at the museum of fine arts.

lender.name: gaviian group
lender.loan_because: we want to assist women who have started small busineses to better support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are a small group of women (14) in Anchorage, Alaska, who have been investing together in an investment club for over ten years. We have recently decided to join Kiva to make loans to women who want to expand their small businesses.

lender.name: Gary Monkey
lender.loan_because: cats look out for each other.
lender.occupational_info: I keep my owners happy by looking cute and purring. They are a teacher and a paramedic.

lender.name: Devon
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by the program, and see a better future coming from these interactions. Kiva has been a light to so many, and it is amazing to realize the influence of the organization.

lender.name: Clifton
lender.loan_because: I think that those of us who are able to help have a responsibility to help those in need.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great idea to help people that want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I Buy and sell houses and teach others how to invest in real estate

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I believe this is one of the most effective mechanisms for helping people lift themselves up financially.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of people who arrange insurance for aircraft.

lender.name: pamela
lender.loan_because: I don't know - it seems to be the right thing to do, to help people try to help themselves. One thing I learned in social work is about a client's right to self determination - but we also recognize that sometimes people need the tools in order to function independently. I think this kind of organization provides people with the tools to determine their own future without being dependent.
lender.occupational_info: I work with patients and their families to plan for a safe return to home, provide emotional support and referrals to community agencies.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great organization.
lender.occupational_info: I make cookies and cupcakes for people I love.

lender.name: Dorin & Tiffany
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful feeling to know that we can help others less fortunate.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people prosper on their own. People who want to better themselves through hard work and imagination are making this a better world for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I help other people buy things. Thank you for reading this. :-)

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: After traveling around the globe, I realize how such a small amount of money can result in a large amount of change.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I am

lender.name: Rae & Mark
lender.loan_because: We like to help people to help themselves and their communities. As a non-profit organisation, we understand the need for working capital to help grow your business.
lender.occupational_info: We ship life-saving, herbal-based pet products around the world. Our highly effective main product prevents and treats the Canine Parvovirus.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I like to feel that I am contributing to the growth and well-being of another.

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with wonderful, challenged children

lender.name: Cristy
lender.loan_because: Regardless of where you are or what you do we are all connected. The world is our community. We are honored to give a neighbor a helping hand.

lender.name: Thom
lender.loan_because: I was helped by friends when I was younger. I think it is now time for me to do the same for others. I am so overwhelmed by the Kindness I feel when logged on to Kiva, I just know I must help... I enjoy seeing others that are helping and I wish more would tell about themselves. It's ok, it is being part of the Kiva family...
lender.occupational_info: In my retirement I am the webmaster of an internet website on my favorite subject... The Outdoors... Visit with Us...

lender.name: Vernon
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping when I can, and the Gospel tells us to love our neighbors as ourselves. We can all help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired chemical engineer and businessman

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: sharing is caring

lender.name: mattandjohn
lender.loan_because: i machine
lender.occupational_info: we make small plastic pieces to help science

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: We should do all we can to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze medical data to track disease progression

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: we can all make a difference no matter how big or small.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: God has given me everything and entrusted me with a little extra to give joyfully.

lender.name: Tomas
lender.loan_because: It makes me happier and I hope it makes others happier too.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to build a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I am in information technology, and application development. So basically I am a computer geek.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I believe God calls us all to share what we have with those that need. Kiva is a safe practical and resourceful way to meet that call.
lender.occupational_info: I manage Information Systems projects for Healthcare Organizations.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I am a former TV journalist who has reported from many developing nations. I have seen first hand the need for loans like these. Kiva makes sense for the lender - and more importantly it helps the borrower succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the renewable energy business, developing ways to replace the use of petroleum. I care about the dignity of work and the dignity of every person on earth.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy that I can help people all around the world.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: God loves the world and I believe this can help show that love to people willing to work hard and better the lives of themselves and their families.

lender.name: Eric & Mariam
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful example for my baby girl.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I run a small business and had to start with very little help. Also, as a follower of Eckankar, I know that good energy multiplies and spreads to all when people take control and responsibility for their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with sick and also healthy people to build their health in a natural manner without drugs or surgery.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: "Whatsoever you do to the least of my brothers, that you do unto me." Life goes by in the twinkling of an eye.
lender.occupational_info: I am an owner of a beauty salon, where we do haircuts, perms, color , skin care, makeup and nails.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I study God and mankind relationship with God.

lender.name: Iain
lender.loan_because: I've seen first hand the benefits of micro-financing in a number of developing nations. The traditional banking system has failed the small entrepreneur - in some countries their interest rates exceed 100% - usury to say the least. Microfinancing puts people in different nations closed together helping with world understanding.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am 11 years old and am in Grade 6.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: We can't reach or help provide a chance to everyone who needs it, but through Kiva, we can reach some.
lender.occupational_info: I create, improve, and/or muck about with computer systems.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good. I get my friends and family to do it by setting an example. I use open source programs that don't accept donations, but ask you to donate on their behalf (BitPim this is for you).
lender.occupational_info: I setup and build computer networks. I also build optical chips for computers. By degree I am a mechanical engineer and particularly interested in bringing clean water everyone in the world.

lender.name: Lexie
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be in need, and I know how grateful I've been to receive help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother of one. Every mother knows my work! =)

lender.name: Walt
lender.loan_because: I want to see people in less privileged economies than the US have a chance at a better life

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: the money I loan will be of use to needy people many times over (rather than through one time gifts). I like the idea of being able to see how people use the funds to better their lives and help their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: i make sure that my company's internet websites are up and running on a 24x7 basis.

lender.name: dsjglobel
lender.loan_because: it makes one feel good to help others realize their dream.this in turn helps me realize my own.one would never think so little could go so far!
lender.occupational_info: i protect the u.s and other military by providing security to post and employees.

lender.name: Dottie
lender.loan_because: Making a difference makes me feel good.

lender.name: Cara
lender.loan_because: I, myself, am a small buisness owner. We all need to start somewhere...

lender.name: Athena Ivan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become self-sufficient and productive members of their societies.

lender.name: Sid
lender.loan_because: We all need to work together to balance our world and this program could help. I want all peoples to have options and enjoy good lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work hard and long, but I am able to support myself and family well.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: This is such an easy way to help change the world by helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Steve & Jeanne
lender.occupation: Sr. Product Mgr and Stay-at-Home Mom
lender.loan_because: it just makes sense!
lender.occupational_info: Jeanne-I cook, I clean, I play, I wipe noses and other parts, I do laundry - lots of laundry. That about sums it up.

lender.name: Stargazer Lily
lender.loan_because: Sharing the abundance that I have been honored to receive.

lender.name: Tally
lender.loan_because: I'm incredibly blessed and I want to help others. I hold to the belief that God wants us to be more of a highway than a cul-de-sac when it comes to resources he places in our hands.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a Christian Pastor of a church.
While conservative in our theology we are liberal in our methodology and we believe one of the greatest failures in the church as a whole has been the lack of care for the weak.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I care about people, but I detest most traditional left wing causes that I see as economically infeasible. This project gives me a chance to help people in a way that will advance their long term wellbeing.

lender.name: Ami
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Educator

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Now we can think globally, act locally, and act globally. It is our job as citizens of the richest nation in the world to fill the gap left by our government in sharing an appropriate portion of our wealth.
lender.occupational_info: Opening the minds of teenagers to the power they have in changing the world.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a law student.

lender.name: Mans
lender.loan_because: To nurture the entrepreneurial spirit!

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to feel good, to be happy and to become the person they choose to be.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: A 2006 trip to China showed me how much I have in common even with people who look and live much different than I. This heightened empathy motivates me to do my small part to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a history teacher. I also teach martial arts (Kung Fu).

lender.name: mohad
lender.loan_because: for help all poor people that is my life

lender.name: Carlton
lender.loan_because: My family an I are proud to be Americans. As such we respect our good fortune and seek, as good world citizens, to make a difference for those less fortunate. We have been to nearly 50 countries and are currently publishing a book (www.portraitsofourworld.com) to raise money to build schools in Africa as well.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of photographers who enjoy sharing the hope and dreams of people around the world.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: A little money from each of us goes a long way to help those who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a family lawyer

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: How can I not loan when you see how little can make such a big difference
lender.occupational_info: I do accounting work for small businesses-lots of numbers in my life!

lender.name: Daryl
lender.loan_because: I am in business for myself and know how hard it can be to raise capital to expand a business venture. I enjoy helping others that want to succeed.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I lived in a developing country for 33 months. I was "living poor" at the time. The people, with their limited resources, were so incredibly good to me. Now I am able to financially help others and be part of a larger group that can make a difference.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: we live in a world of drastic inequity where the few enjoy control over-- and the ability to share--so many resources.

lender.name: Caryn
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help others around the world who are not as fortunate as I am.
lender.occupational_info: Dog-walker, Dog obedience trainer, consultant

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: my daughter gave this as a gift.

lender.name: mithal family
lender.loan_because: To change lives of people i.e. ensuring that no one is left behind in basic health care, having basic education, and having basic needs.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I have a strong belief in helping people to get started or improve their ability to support themselves. The classic "give a man a fish vs teach him to fish" mentality. This is a great idea that needs word of mouth support.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a city bus in Tucson, Arizona, not any different then bus drivers anywhere in the world.

lender.name: Tom & Mariam
lender.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Martijn
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Kiva initiative, making it more accessible through digital communication to offer support to people far away in a simple yet profound way.
lender.occupational_info: I make computer games, websites and digital graphics.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe this is one of the better ways to truly help others: to help them help themselves. God has blessed me, and I want to be a blessing to others, too.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a project manager for a cause marketing consulting firm and I also am a Human Resources consultant, specializing in corporate benefits. One day I'd love to make my living solely by producing independent films.

lender.name: Lynne' (Njeri)
lender.occupation: House wife and manage our nightly rental

lender.name: Edith
lender.loan_because: Personal involvement in microcredit seems like an ideal way to attack poverty. And Kiva's pioneering use of the online social networking concept to deliver funds to individual business owners in developing countries is brilliant. It builds a sense of connection across borders and cultures. On April 1, 2008, I made my first second generation loan. Thanks to the responsible payback by Mayra Palomino Del Aquila from Peru, the Hai Gam Group in Sudan had funds to support their business! And on May 15, 2009, their loan was paid in full so a third generation loan could be made. And now, August 16, 2009, I was able to make a new loan to Mayra Palomino to support the business she shares with her husband. On February 15, 2009, the first loan I ever made on Kiva was paid back in full by Chea Sophy in Cambodia.
lender.occupational_info: I work in grant writing and interpretation services at the oldest public hospital in the U.S., Bellevue, and have always worked in public health. My passion, though, is scubadiving, and in the past ten years I've traveled to many beautiful sites across the world to view the coral reefs.

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: We have to stick together!
lender.occupational_info: I advise mobile phone network operators on how to become a little bit better every day. It's fun!

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be in a position to. This is one great way to see your money benefit people all over the world - repeatedly. It is constantly fascinating.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting people who work to improve their own life.
lender.occupational_info: I help business managers learn how to improve their personal performance.

lender.name: Joonas
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity.

lender.name: IN MEMORY OF JSL
lender.loan_because: There is no good reason not to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying for a doctorate in Clinical Psychology. I want to work with youthful offenders and help them change their lives to become productive members of society.

lender.name: Florentine
lender.loan_because: For 2 years now I have been living in Venezuela. And this experience has made me fall in love with South America; it's people, culture and nature. Such a live altering adventure.... I am glad I can do something in return.
lender.occupational_info: I design packaging and logo's (for cunsumer products) like boxes, labels and even manuals. I also do lay-outs for books and I am a (hobby) photografer.

lender.name: Maria Teresa
lender.loan_because: I just wish to start a Health Spa Business but I am short of cash as I just came from a Philippine for my Father burial.Ahh,I wish somebody out there will share this business w/ me.and I know I can make it.Thanks
lender.occupational_info: I am working here in the Health club for Ladies and It is really a very demanding job as most of the people here are having stress.

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: i need a loan

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: If there is a solution for alleviating global poverty then I want to be part of it.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with good health and good fortune and I wish that everyone could have the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired hospital head manager.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in developing countries who are willing to work hard to better themselves and their families. I expect spin off effect in the community.

lender.name: DrC
lender.loan_because: The world has been good to me, so I feel the need to reciprocate.

lender.name: Coco Humiston
lender.loan_because: They deserve it.

lender.name: PACI
lender.loan_because:
PACI is a student organization at The Ohio State University consisting of people who loan because they know it's the right thing to do.
After a few initial meetings and successful loans, we're excited about starting off the new school year strong and bringing in more interested students!

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I think that with a little help, everyone can make it.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small store where I sell women's clothing and accessories.

lender.name: Brigid
lender.loan_because: Rewarding individual initiative is a great way to improve society.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large hi tech company, coordinating business around the world.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Recieved a chance to loan for a birthday gift. I really like the idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nationally certified automotive mechanic which meands I service and repair all types of automobiles..

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: To help people help themselves.

lender.name: Sung
lender.loan_because: I saw this program on Frontline and became very intrigued by the lending process. I may not be able to help out in big ways, but I can help out in small ways.
lender.occupational_info: Work with computer all day.

lender.name: Suzette
lender.loan_because: I can't imagine NOT...
lender.occupational_info: I communicate Soul to Soul, the way we were created to do.

lender.name: Jeff & Nancy
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I love helping people achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a public servant. I'm also a photographer, a gardener, a reader, and a traveler.

lender.name: Michael Victor
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being of service to other entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because:
I don't have a lot of money as a student, so I am chosy where I donate. I like this organization because it helps people that help themselves, and can continue to help new people when loans are repaid.
I am very interested in culture, and I think that this is a wonderful way to make connections throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for my PhD. in school psychology. I speak Spanish and would like to work with a culturally diverse population.

lender.name: ANGUS
lender.loan_because: By looking for the best in people, you are almost always find it.
lender.occupational_info: When not chasing rubber balls and frisbees, I work as a pollster.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I'm awe of the entrepreneurs involved in this program. Loaning through Kiva is truly the least that I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I create logos, websites, icons, catalogs, animation... that sort of stuff.

lender.name: Javier
lender.loan_because: a single mouth can never taste the sweetest honey.

lender.name: Xiomara
lender.loan_because: My goal is to support as many women as possible in their desire to be prosperous and self sufficient. When a woman contributes to the care of the family, everyone benefits at her home and in the world. I will also support men in their effort to provide and protect their families
lender.occupational_info: I am very fortunate and grateful to live where I live, and due to the many opportunities and choices I have, I am in my third career. I am in the business of making women feel beautiful by taking care of their skin, their body, and their soul.

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: this gives opportunity for change

lender.name: piyush
lender.loan_because:
My name is PIYUSH BANERJEA. I am from India I am writting this to u all. pls read it. I am a simple person from India. Use to have a small leather business. I was happy in my own world. Was working with all honesty.Suddenly one day I got in touch with a person on net. He posed to be an importer of leather goods. He showed very keen interest in my Products. He was very professional. In two, three days intraction he asked me for sample. He was unknown to me. i tried to be smart and asked for advance. Without any hagitation he agreed. he gave me international postal money orders. he used some american address .I deposited the postal money orders to my bank. In due course the bank cleared the money orders. It gave me strength to beleive him. I gave him the samples. later on he gave me bulk order for my goods and paid the amount by postal money orders. again the same procedure. i submitted-bank cleared it. but in the mean time he did one tricky thing. he increased the order . he gave me money in advance so i didn't have single doubt on him. I manufactured the goods from my own pocket. I was very happy . i was doing good. I shipped the goods to him. Then i started asking him for the balance payment but to my utter surprise he stopped receiving my call and not even gave any response to my emails.and suddenly after few time bank personal turned up to my place and asked me to return the money and the reason they gave me to do so was that the postal money order which i got from that person turned to be fake.. by knowing this earth slipped beneath my feets. I was in complete dark. bank started legal action against me. later on I came to know that the person who gave me the postal money order was a Nigerian. i am totally ruined. Didn't have enough money to give a normal life to my wife and two kids.i am bound to repay the bank otherwise they will put me behind bars. Yes I am victim of NIGERIAN SCAMMERS. I am writting all this beacuse I need ur valuable support. I know life is not so easy. But for my fault my family members are not suppose to live like this.Money is very important for everyone. I just need little support from u all so that i can repay the bank. i don't have much time. You must be thinking that this is a new way to earn money but this is not true in this case.So i request u and all ur friends for the sake of humanity pls help me .If u think that i am right then pls donate any amount to the below mentioned paypal id.your small help will do alot to my family. I am really very sorry for troubling u all. PLS trust me I am in need and thats why i am asking for help from u all. I know i am iritating u all. I don't have any other option but to ask for help from u all. I am not asking for big donation. just give me 300-500US$. I am begging to u all. this will help me to repay my debts and re-establish myself. I have no right to ask for money from u all but i don't have any other option. Just help this poor brahmin.
abhishal.s@rediffmail.com this is my friend paypal id. i am also providing my account details: Bank Name : JP MORGAN CHASE, NEW YORK Swift Code : CHASUS33XXX (Intermediary bank) Bank Clearing Code : FED ABA 021000021
For credit to: Account Number : 400808595 USD Beneficiary Bank : ICICI Bank Ltd., Mumbai (India)
FOR FINAL CREDIT TO ICICI BANK KANPUR BRANCH A/C NAME; PIYUSH BANERJEA MY ACCOUNT NO.628801516827 BRANCH CODE: 6288 A request by Piyush Banerjea 69/3,vijay nagar kanpur India
lender.occupational_info: I want to re-establish

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I believe in the effectiveness of microloans to empower people and enable families to raise their living standards.
lender.occupational_info: I have been selling, installing and servicing electronic security alarm systems for homes & businesses since 1984. I operate my business out of my home. For the last 4 years I've been working alone, but have had as many as 3 employees at a time.

lender.name: Aubrey
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone a leg up so that they can do the same for another.
lender.occupational_info: I rescue pets from poor conditions or people who do not want them and find them loving families.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of people helping people in this way, and to help others who are working hard to make better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Aircraft

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: My Partner and I relocated to south west France from Scotland. We are retailers of high quality English paint amongst many other products.

lender.name: jelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are motivated and hardworking.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations (NGO's) function more effectively so that they are better able to achieve their missions.

lender.name: Les petites
lender.loan_because: Hopefully this small act will impact others and make their lives richer and fuller.
lender.occupational_info: I have the joy of working with flowers, arranging them for churches, weddings and parties. Everyone loves flowers.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because:
I've met my entrepreneurs in Guatemala and that was an experience I'll never forget.
You can see some pictures here: http://jessicabraun.wordpress.com/2008/06/04/mikrokredite-wurden-sie-dieser-frau-20-euro-leihen/

lender.name: Denny
lender.loan_because: Micro credit is a wonderful way for people to become successful and self-sufficient!

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Even a small amount can mean so much to an entreprenneur committed to improving their lives and those of their family.
lender.occupational_info: Office worker.

lender.name: Frederic
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: Internet advertising

lender.name: Rafael
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate with my family
lender.occupational_info: I buy ingredients for a big corporation in the US

lender.name: Thibaud
lender.loan_because: Help others
lender.occupational_info: I'm a french student

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together. It's impossible to solve all the world's problems, but we have to start somewhere. Kiva allows us to participate in building a better world.

lender.name: YMX Investment Club
lender.loan_because: We believe in entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of friends who invest our lives into 12-19 year olds!

lender.name: paulo
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others succeed. If it were not for the help I received growing up I would not be able to give to others now.
lender.occupational_info:
I help married couples have better marriages. I decrease fighting in families. I help individuals feel better about themselves.
See my Website for the art work I do

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: World Bank and IMF loans do not meet the needs of world citizens.
lender.occupational_info: I am a documentary filmmaker and scholar living and working in the United States.

lender.name: J Thomas
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing is such a marvelous idea. Our family has supported the Grameen bank for many years; Kiva is a way for us to reach out on a more "person to person" level.
lender.occupational_info: I am a heart specialist who treats heart failure

lender.name: Stu
lender.loan_because: I now have an opportunity to "Think Locally, Act Globally"
lender.occupational_info: I'm a commercial seaplane pilot in the Seattle area. When I'm not flying, I conduct geographic data analysis for environmental organizations. Stray cats seem to find comfort in my arms.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I'm an avid traveler, and this is a wonderful way to stay connected to the people and places that have touched me.
lender.occupational_info: I used to write and help develop other writers for a living. Now I write for fun.

lender.name: retrojayne
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of donating personally to a distinct individual or small group. That way I know the money gets to them straightaway. Kind of like Sally Struthers' commercials, but without the scariness of Sally Struthers.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I enjoyed Muhammad Yunus' Nobel Prize acceptance speech and wanted to help encourage his ideas.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I have met the most lovely people in the world in rural Guatemala.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother over all else, but I am also starting a company that makes tote bags, so we will no longer need disposable ones.

lender.name: Pradyumna
lender.loan_because: No better way to fight poverty than to help people help themselves. =)

lender.name: Mai
lender.loan_because: I want to support my brothers and sisters around the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I think the supreme aim of human life is working to create a more humane society.
Act so as to elicit the best in others, and thereby in yourself. ~Felix Adler~

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I recognize that a small investment can have a global impact.
lender.occupational_info: I am an advocate and educator on alternative energy; specializing at the moment in small scale biodiesel production. Using locally available materials and vegetable oil biodiesel can be made for significantly less money than the comparable amount of petroleum diesel. It is sustainable and renewable.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I am told to...
lender.occupational_info: I help companies install and maintain their computer networks

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I believe in investing in people.

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: I can. I have been very blessed in my life and I want others to be able to realize their dreams. In many countries people cannot depend on their government to protect their well being. These stories are about people surviving and hopefully thriving in their communities, by doing it on their own. The best kind of giving is when you can see the change your donation can make.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Executive Director of GreenLink. An alliance committed to promoting energy efficiency and conservation and the technologies that support energy reduction in homes and businesses. I am also a part time doctoral student at George Mason University where I am studying Environmental Policy. I live in the beautiful Shenandoah Valley with my amazing husband Mike and our two dogs. We enjoy getting outside and exploring...hiking, fishing and golfing (poorly).

lender.name: Nancita
lender.loan_because: it's easy, sensible and so interesting.

lender.name: hanavcbc
lender.occupation: mortgage broker, mortgage rate calculator, mortgage calculator, best mortgage rate

lender.name: Layfayette
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give. -Sir Winston Churchill-

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: My daughter sent me a gift certificate for my birthday!

lender.name: Toby
lender.loan_because: I make a difference in peoples lives by helping them to create their own income.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: "The door to happiness opens outward." Kierkegaard

lender.name: James Omdahl
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: Online marketer, blogger and Kiva fan :)

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: A way to give back while encouraging growth in the global economy.
lender.occupational_info: I manage all types of projects/programs and support the "People, Service, Profit" philosophy.

lender.name: Calvin
lender.loan_because: I believe in free enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying at American University in Washington, DC. I study the world; I learn about history, culture, business, politics, and economics.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to achieve satisfaction and happiness via self-sufficiency. It's a good feeling knowing that you're helping others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, after more than 32 years of working for the government.

lender.name: Rodney
lender.loan_because: So few have so much and so many more have so little. Everyone deserves a chance, if they want it. Why not loan?
lender.occupational_info: I help report and analyze other people's money.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I'm a business owner and understand the value of a good loan.
lender.occupational_info: I deal with the transportation and installation for some of the most expensive art in the world.

lender.name: Slane
lender.loan_because: It's a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I help create websites for Disney DVDs.

lender.name: Tommy
lender.loan_because: I have a good life. I want to help someone else have the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Conductor for a Major Passenger Railroad. I help move several thousand people a day.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: empowerment (financial and otherwise) is important to me, and Kiva does amazing work!
lender.occupational_info: I write & promote online materials about women's rights and the global women's movement. I also teach dance.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I was given a wonderful opportunity 14 years ago and bilieve in sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I help clients with their investment, insurance and financial planning.

lender.name: Overbrook Educational
lender.loan_because: We, the sixth graders at OEC, a Philadelphia public school, loan because we want to see how we can have an impact upon people around the world.
lender.occupational_info:
We are young people who care. The picture is of us in the letters "O", "E", and "C" -- a short cut for our school name.
Peace and love.

lender.name: Mike Hinton
lender.loan_because: There is no better way to invest in the prosperity of the whole world.
lender.occupational_info: I do Physics research at a school in Ohio. We experiment to find new science.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that publishes children's educational materials.

lender.name: Fabian
lender.loan_because: I believe that people are hard workers and that they need someone to believe in them in order to grow.
lender.occupational_info: We give microcredits to finance house improvements and complete houses in poor areas in Mexico.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I want to see how people can make a business thrive from a few simple loans. I admire these people for the work they do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Sophomore in College at Middle Tennessee State University. I am a psychology major and a french and possibly business minor.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I care about the economic health of the people of countries that the U.S. continues to take advantage of. We the people of the U.S. have to make it right.

lender.name: Kirsten&Ben
lender.loan_because: There is more happiness is giving.

lender.name: Scott and Cindy
lender.loan_because: We have been very blessed in our lives and would like to help others to improve their lives.

lender.name: Troy & Becky
lender.loan_because: We believe we're blessed so that we can be a blessing to others! If not us, then who? If not now, when? Get involved with Kiva. It's a great thing!

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate for my birthday to Kiva. I think it is kinda cool to be able to loan money to someone across the world!

lender.name: NewLeaf Chocolates
lender.loan_because: It makes us feel good. Also, people should be rewarded for taking the initiative to improve their lives. If people are living in a sustainable economy and have their basic needs met, they are more likely to live peaceful lives.
lender.occupational_info: NewLeaf Chocolates is an online shop that provides the world's best premium chocolates in a sustainable way. We continuously affirm our commitment to the planet in these tangible ways: 1) Offering a wide selection of organic and fair-trade bars, confections and drinking chocolate, 2) Shipping all chocolate in our sustainable GreenPod that uses only plant-based materials and 3) Donating a portion of all sales to the environment. Visit our website at: www.newleafchocolates.com

lender.name: Mzurie
lender.loan_because: it transforms my good intentions into action.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in Rustavi, Georgia (Republic of). I write Living Rootless, a blog about travel and about living a portable life.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: it's a very simple and effective way to help.

lender.name: LA & Alli
lender.loan_because: We want help the people who strive to improve their own lives and those of the people around them.
lender.occupational_info: Work to reconstruct and improve aquatic and terrestrial habitat for the benefit of wildlife and people.

lender.name: Lillian
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of a hand up over a hand out. I don't have a lot of money to continually donate.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I am impressed with people that have such a drive to accomplish their dreams despite their circumstances, and, besides, I have more than enough to share and have no reason not to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying biochemistry currently, with hopes of eventually becoming a doctor.

lender.name: wilfredo
lender.loan_because: I want to lend money because desire to develop a project based on the manufacture of musical instruments with recycled materials and to be able to take it to the children of low resources in my pais solicito $3000 us
lender.occupational_info: it is a project by which desire that the low children of resource motivate themselves, so that they develop musical skills and they are concienticen as well that we must reuse materials that we rejected every day

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing other people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to use computers.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: somebody else may need the money more than I

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Small businesses are the thread that holds the world economy together. As an entrepeneur myself, I definitely understand the importance of working capital and cash flow.
lender.occupational_info: My company creates software that helps large high-tech organizations manage and optimize their tangible assets - equipment, tools, computers, vehicles, etc. in order to increase profits and also comply with all applicable regulations.

lender.name: José
lender.loan_because: I think it is very important to help others support themselves and their families.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I care about you.
lender.occupational_info: To educate North Americans that they are not the only people in our world.

lender.name: Daniel Andres
lender.occupational_info: Professional problem solver

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: All these people are people with dreams, and they have a plan to achieve those dreams. I believe in supporting people who back up their dreams with a plan.

lender.name: Josepha
lender.loan_because: I've had such a lucky life; I'd like to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people use computers by making the software better, and writing instructions on how to use software.

lender.name: Duane
lender.loan_because: I feel that putting money in the hands of the people will allow the people to have control of the Govenrment.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer for anti-terrorism lectures. Musician / Composer Helicopter Pilot

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful opportunity to be able to help someone improve their life.

lender.name: The Farrells
lender.loan_because: We who can, should help.

lender.name: RuthAnn
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I work with high school students to teach them music.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: I write music for movies and television

lender.name: CW, Stuf, Pen &da Lou
lender.loan_because: We can and we should. We do what we can and should do it again.
lender.occupational_info: Satisfaction through creation of value.

lender.name: Damon
lender.loan_because: I wish others would do the same to help secure the betterment of all lives globally. Our motto is "You- Me -HE- She -Everyone".
lender.occupational_info: I am engaged in the clothing industry, from designing to manufacturing to wholesaling and retailing...won many awards throughout North America and been in many magazines. Now beginning to Re Emerge back into industry on a global platform.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to extend the benefits that we Americans enjoy so much throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I recently graduated from the University of Virginia and will be working in politics in Washington DC.

lender.name: Sébastien Straulino
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to be useful. To lend money to people around the world is also almost so exciting as travelling there !

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to develop our nations communities, spiritually,educationaly, financially, technologicaly, and otherwise. and $120,000 is required to accomplish this projects.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to develop humanities, by providing them with required needs, naturally and spiritually.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It's easy to do, and a small amount of money goes a long way. Once you are paid back, you just loan it again to someone else. The gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: this is a wonderful way to directly assist someone in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: Busily retired

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in my life to be able to borrow money when I wanted to expand my business so I would like to help other enterprising people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes and land to various people and businesses. I especially like to help young people find a way to finance their first home.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance!
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs of nature for the beauty and to share.

lender.name: Jim & Debbie
lender.loan_because: we want to do our part in making the world a better place for everyone. When we reach out to help someone else, we both win.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: If I can help someone who really needs it, not just to give them money, but help them build a better life for themself, then that is the best gift I can give.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers for a University in Minnesota.

lender.name: luqman
lender.loan_because: I want to expand my bussiness
lender.occupational_info: I work in Ghana,Africa.I do sell in a shop.I sell provisions ie:soap,milk,sugar etc.I need to expant my trade.

lender.name: Kerry & Braille
lender.loan_because: It helps people across the world get a good start on what they want to pursue. Also, we have 2 loans in "Togo" which is our Siberian Husky's name!
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for Launch Control Systems at Kennedy Space Center, Florida. Braille is a 11th grade student.

lender.name: Arjan
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance to make money in order to have a good life. I hope my small help will help a lot of people to earn money and make a better life for themselves and there loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: I have a plantation in Poland, where we grow Robinia trees which will be grown for 8 years and then used for stakes.

lender.name: ted
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help with securing a data network at a large University.

lender.name: kath
lender.loan_because: a little help goes a long way
lender.occupational_info: internet project manager

lender.name: Sylvie
lender.loan_because: I want to share all the blessings I'm given daily... I believe in personal empowerment through manifesting one's dreams... I am one of the lucky few on this planet and I feel the need to pay forward... in joyful celebration of our Unity...
lender.occupational_info: I translate books from English to French, mostly on health, spirituality, personal growth, etc.

lender.name: Dahn
lender.loan_because: I want to support the millennium development goals and this is a great way to do just that.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a priest in the Episcopal Church.

lender.name: Raj & Usha 'G'
lender.loan_because: I believe self help is always better than charity and allows one to maintain self respect.
lender.occupational_info: I am a civil engineer from India and personally know what poverty does to families. I hope I can help some.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I have students who raised a lot of money running a company for their math class. They voted to donate their money to people on KIVA to help them with their businesses!
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a Middle School in Westminster, CA. I have the privilege of teaching 8th grade students Algebra.

lender.name: Birthe
lender.loan_because: I think it's a fantastic idea - a great way to help people get a better life
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish and IT at a university

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I hope by the time I am 18 years poverty will be a thing of the past.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: of the Millennium Goals and I am blessed beyond my needs.
lender.occupational_info: Assist an Episcopal bishop and the clergy people of the diocese in their ministries.

lender.name: Kaloyan
lender.loan_because: "Microfinance is a viable option that promotes independence and a better way of life."

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It's one more thing I can do to help others.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: God is good
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my two daughters taking care of their day-to-day needs.

lender.name: Jörg
lender.loan_because: I like kivas direct approach. Supporting people on a 1:1 basis is great.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and maintain software applications in finance, automotive and telecommunication companies.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good about myself to be able to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Boring computer stuff

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to many poor areas of the world and seen the impact that a few dollars can have. I'm amazed at the resourcefulness and persistence of people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital department that helps people with mental health and addictions problems. I am also a singer-songwriter.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I think it's the responsibility of people to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help empower people to improve their working conditions and wages by coming together with their coworkers in strength and solidarity.

lender.name: Dr. Evil
lender.loan_because: global domination
lender.occupational_info: Belgian parents, evil son, powerful laser, the usual.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: God is good and I want to share with others what he has given me. People have always been helpful to me when I have needed loans and I want to do the same for others in return.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I wish to help.
lender.occupational_info: I weave in small small threads.....stretch them out in back of the loom on a table and paint with dyes on the warp. I then roll it back on the loom and weave it with tiny sewing thread to make a saleable item.

lender.name: Kayla
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I sit inside at a desk in front of a computer all day long.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I have, they need.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science in a small community in Louisiana. We have many exchange students from all over the world who help us to understand other cultures and to see the people from those places as fellow citizens of the planet.

lender.name: Franz
lender.loan_because: I know what is is to get a dream project off the ground. The ideal of independence and contribute one's passion for creativity to the commons.
lender.occupational_info: Creative. Inventive. Imaginative. Thing of better ways and bring them to fruition.

lender.name: Karena
lender.loan_because: by the Grace of God....I am blessed! Beautiful magick happens...once you trust in your true self and the beautiful unity of mankind! We are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: When you hurt...I hurt...I choose life ..yours and mine and it is only through our "togetherness" can we be truly EMPOWERED!

lender.name: C & D
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power of microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: Urban planning: assist local governments and citizens make choices about the character of their town or city.

lender.name: NYCCats
lender.loan_because: We want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: We fix computers.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people help themselves.

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: as a student, I don't have much extra money to give away to charities but with Kiva, I know I'm helping others and not losing any money.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant at night, and during the day I attend school.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate... it is only fair to share the fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I help a global business understand the challenges of high growth economies.

lender.name: Abdylas
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I provide Web Design related products and services.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help single women achieve their goals.

lender.name: Adam & Jayme
lender.loan_because: I care, can & should.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I try to promote peace and justice through fostering individual initiative.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Someone said in order to keep it you must give it away. The Lord is good. I enjoy giving to others in need.
lender.occupational_info: Home Finance. Helping home buyers acheive Real Estate Success.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: To share my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I get things moved between hospitals.

lender.name: France & Stuart
lender.loan_because: How very rewarding to help these business owners earn their livelihood.

lender.name: Lata
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone needs to have a chance to be successful. Microfinancing is an ideal vehicle to ensure that the underprivileged have an opportunity to raise themselves up through hard work.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I'm amazed and what can be accomplished when a few people come together for a purpose. I would like to share the love and blessings Christ has given to me.

lender.name: Ericka
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference on the lives of other people that are less fortunate.

lender.name: Kristi & EXPO D.C. Kids
lender.occupation: Day Care Manager and Kids from the program
lender.occupational_info: EXPO Discovery Club is a school-age child care program. We provide care before school, after school and all day during vacation. The children range in age form 4 to 12 years old. We are a safe fun place for kids to be while their parents are working. Kristi is the manager of the program. The 3rd and 4th graders rasied money this summer to be apart of the loan program.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: Loaning is fulfilling.
lender.occupational_info: Transform and transport culture

lender.name: Serge
lender.loan_because: I believe that in my and others small way we are improving these peoples lives.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in a position to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of anthropology in Toronto, Canada.

lender.name: Yesul
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to people who need help. Even if it's just a small amount of money, I believe it would be valuable and helpful to somebody.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in Georgetown University in Washington DC.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.occupation: Dictator of a small, yet important island

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to leave the world better than I found it.

lender.name: Kyla
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Doug and Jo
lender.loan_because: It's one small thing that I can do
lender.occupational_info: I work to clean up soil and groundwater pollution.

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: Microfinance works- as can be seen by the excellent payback rate and the thriving businesses that have been created.
lender.occupational_info: Work in the financial counseling/education field.

lender.name: reuben
lender.loan_because: I can, and i like to help
lender.occupational_info: fun powerful and satisfying

lender.name: Chris & Rhea
lender.loan_because: We care and we can. We also represent another group - CWG is a spiritual group from Tweed. Australia

lender.name: Omo
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to empower people.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: This started as a grassroots company that is making a difference in actual peoples' lives. The money goes to them, not a government or 3rd party.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse, work nights in a large trauma center hospital.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to end poverty

lender.name: Johanne
lender.loan_because: I think everybody deserve a chance to have a better life.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: My husband gave it to me as my birthday present. He knew I had a heart for helping others. He felt this was a way I could obey Jesus' words, "I was a stranger, and you took me in."
lender.occupational_info: I help people worship Jesus through music.

lender.name: Nimbostratusdweller
lender.loan_because: Much of the world is poor, I am rich only in comparison, we need to equalize. Helping others who are in need, knowing their circumstance, keeps my heart; alive, human, warm, caring. I'd hope someone would help me, and from my suffering, feel their own heart beating, creating hope.
lender.occupational_info: I work with clay.....an artisan ....please, it is Christmas. You who can loan, you are The gift!

lender.name: Bruce & Susan
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he will eat for today. Teach a man to fish and he will eat foverer!
lender.occupational_info: Home away from for familes of sick and injured children

lender.name: Sura
lender.loan_because: we each must do what we can to serve, love and support each other and that is true happiness.

lender.name: PADT, Inc.
lender.loan_because: As a successful small business we are always looking for ways to give back to our local and global community. With a strong believe in the power of small business owners to bring stability, education and democracy to their communities, we felt Micro Loans were a great way to help other entrepreneurs grow and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: PADT, Inc. is a 50 person company made up of mostly engineers. We use computer technology and aerospace engineering methods to help customers from around the world turn their ideas for products into devices that are strong, long-lasting and efficient.

lender.name: Troy
lender.occupational_info: Build technology products & companies

lender.name: Jed Clampett
lender.loan_because: Now that Elly May and Jethro have graduated from college, I'm suddenly flush with disposable income. I figured this was a cool way to spend it.
lender.occupational_info: I struck oil while hunting. Then, I moved my family to Beverly Hills, California.

lender.name: Emily & Alex
lender.loan_because: Microfinance seems an excellent way to support the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: Emily designs antennas and electronic circuits. Alex writes computer software for web sites.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: One person CAN make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I design and sell crazy mascot costumes to clients in the US and around the world.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I find it satisfying to give others the means to help themselves.

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: I like to travel and have visited many countries. Loaning is a possibility to give something back for the help and kindness I experienced from people all over the world.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: What a chance to help make a difference in someone's life, for the cost of a meal out! Like, wow, I love it.

lender.name: Dionne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of those less fortunate than I. "For it is in giving that we receive." St. Francis of Assisi
lender.occupational_info: I work for Lockheed Martin, the world's largest defense contractor. I support internal programs/projects.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I would like to see a direct positive impact from my loan to people most in need. I lived in Malaysia for 3 years and am fond of the spirit of the people of this area.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: Enabling people to help themselves seems so much more effective than handouts. Wasn't there some saying about teaching some guy to fish?

lender.name: Judy T.
lender.loan_because: I want to give something back to the world.
lender.occupational_info: OB/GYN Nurse Practitioner: I provide maternity care and other medical services for women.

lender.name: Tristin
lender.loan_because: These people are trying hard to make it work. This shows you how easy it is to work together and help others out.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want to help other hard working people around the world. Hopefully the loans bring more opportunities that they might not have otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small company of 35 people. My company sells/provides computer software to companies that provide telephone service to their customers. My job is to help our new clients get setup and using our computer software.

lender.name: DeAnna
lender.loan_because:
"We get everything we want in life, by helping others get what they want."
It's not how much..but how many of us together.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to support the dreams of business men and women all over the world who are trying to make their jobs and lives better. I have been fortunate in my situation and want to share it with others. Achieving my business goals is something I hope to accomplish for myself one day soon.
lender.occupational_info: I create software that allows vendors all over the world to market and sell their products on the internet.

lender.name: Ashwin
lender.loan_because: I can see that it makes a difference, and I know how much a little help means to a small business. A little of my money goes a very long way . When i travel to difeerent countries, I see how people live and manage. This encouraged me to be part of Kiva so I can help improve peoples lives

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: I grew up in developing countries and have seen how a little help can go a long way, and I'm glad to finally find a way to really help people change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer.

lender.name: KT
lender.loan_because: We care for those who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I have the financial means to do so and would like to possibly have a postive impact on someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people that are in need of emergency medical care.

lender.name: Timo Traurig
lender.loan_because: it helps
lender.occupational_info: simly doing it

lender.name: Tina M
lender.loan_because: There is joy in giving. When you help otheres you help your self.
lender.occupational_info: I adopted my two nephews. They have made my life wonderful.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lynn and Mike
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care about people in poorer nations and we like to make a difference in someone's life. We particularly like giving to Ugandans because our church has a significant commitment in that country and physical and spiritual needs should be met.
lender.occupational_info: Lynn: I have recently graduated from college and am currently blessed to be teaching 1st grade--which I love!! Mike: Travels the world looking for really neat products to sell to lucky South Texan shoppers.

lender.name: Corey
lender.loan_because: I'm always looking for gifts that will inspire meaning in people who are fortunate enough to have everything they need and more. I just discovered Kiva gift certificates, and I am ordering them this year for friends and family members. It is a wonderful way to celebrate our good lives, while honoring and supporting others and making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I'm interested in green energy and clean technology, and working on a few startup initiatives.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children with learning problems how to read.

lender.name: bizzwriter
lender.loan_because: Microloans are perhaps the best way that someone in the United States can have a measurable, positive, direct -- and long-lasting -- impact on the lives of people in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I write business books, available in more than 20 languages, all around the world.

lender.name: Tibo
lender.loan_because: After traveling to many developing countries I've always wondered how I could efficiently help in a sustainable way those people full of energy and ambitions fulfill their dreams and support their families, without them always depending on the charity of others. With Kiva, I think that I have found it.
lender.occupational_info: I am French, living in the Netherlands. I work in a big company that creates computer software.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: this is a powerful new tool in capital markets...

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because:
This poem says it perfectly:
"There is a destiny that makes us brothers, no one goes his way alone. All that we send into the lives of others, comes back into our own."
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer that tries to educate and unite people from different backgrounds through humor and personal understanding.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage new entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I make factories more effective and productive.

lender.name: M and Q
lender.loan_because: Mom wants us to learn that there are many ways to make our world a better place (and make us better people in the process).

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I want a better life for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I process legal documents related to mortgage lending.

lender.name: Rowan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a small difference to someone who needs a bit of help to create a better life for themselves, their family and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I am one of several Wiccan Priestesses of an established Coven. We work together to heal ourselves, our environment and our great Mother Earth.

lender.name: The Power of We
lender.loan_because: simple things CAN change the world

lender.name: AJ Smith
lender.loan_because: it's the best way I know of to help put an end to the crushing poverty experienced by so many of earth's population. Secondly, I feel so lucky, as a woman, to have been born in the U.S. Women around the world who suffer so much discrimination deserve to have someone in their corner.
lender.occupational_info: I spent 30 years teaching elementary-age children, and I loved my career. My favorite age to teach was 10-11 years old, and I enjoyed exploring books and science with all my classes

lender.name: EmeraldCityCritterCare
lender.loan_because: I want to help - from one small business owner to another. :)

lender.name: Marcus & Katherine
lender.loan_because: Helping others realize their dreams is one way to achieve ours.
